channel.title: Time on Jesusnoseq
channel.description: Recent content in Time on Jesusnoseq

item.title: Time management and control
item.description: My particular case I have always been a very curious person with a tendency to start different projects. It happens to me that I drop the project when it does not motivate me. If I already have the knowledge to complete the project and all that’s left is to spend hours on it, my motivation goes down. This behavior ends up frustrating me because I want to finish projects, not leave them unfinish.
